Title: Brothers in Arms
Plot: Director Shepard makes a huge mistake by meeting a man alone to inform her about Le Grenouille, as their meeting turns into a murder of the informant. Now the NCIS team must gather all the existing info and try to finally hunt down their enemy.
GuestStars: Scottie Thompson, David Dayan Fisher, Sara Botsford, J.C. MacKenzie, Mo Gallini, Peter Birkenhead, Joe Spano
